title: How to Use Pictochat on a Nintendo Ds Lite

steps.headline: Remove your stylus from the side of you Nintendo DS.
Turn on your Nintendo DS by pushing the on button up ONCE.
Tap the box that has PICTOCHAT written on it.
Chose a chatroom (A, B, C or D).
You can now either draw on the empty box with faint lines in or type using the keyboard underneath.
If you want to do it with another person:
Make sure you go on the same chatroom as your friend or another person.
Draw and type to your heart's content.

text: Remove your stylus from the side of you Nintendo DS.  Turn on your Nintendo DS by pushing the on button up ONCE. The screen should turn on. Tap the screen.  Tap the box that has PICTOCHAT written on it.  Chose a chatroom (A, B, C or D).  You can now either draw on the empty box with faint lines in or type using the keyboard underneath.  If you want to do it with another person:  Repeat steps 1-6.  Make sure you go on the same chatroom as your friend or another person.  Draw and type to your heart's content.
